Actions.Name: Copy a board
Actions.Description: Create a copy of an existing board.

Actions.Name: Delete a widget
Actions.Description: Delete a specific widget by its unique identifier.

Actions.Name: Get a board
Actions.Description: Get a specific board by its unique identifier.

Actions.Name: Get boards
Actions.Description: Get all boards available to the user.

Actions.Name: Get a widget
Actions.Description: Get a specific single widget by its unique identifier.

Actions.Name: Share a board
Actions.Description: Share an existing board with users.

Actions.Name: Update a board
Actions.Description: Update a specific board by its unique identifier.

Actions.Name: Update a card widget
Actions.Description: Update a specific card widget by its unique identifier.
